title: US Stocks Slouch Into Year End With No Sign of Santa Claus Rally
description: The S&P 500 Index closed out 2025 with a 0.7% loss on Wednesday, near a session low. Just 3% of its members closed in the green, the broadest decline since May.
content: The S&P 500 Index closed out 2025 with a 0.7% loss on Wednesday, near a session low. Just 3% of its members closed in the green, the broadest decline since May.
